name: ScaryFairy
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: scary fairy
des: Scary Fairy is an Alexa skill that provides short horror stories to entertain lovers of horror stories. They are told by the Scary Fairy who loves nothing more than a good horror story. She loves to creep people out and make them scared. It's really fun for her. She always say, "The Exorcist is my favorite horror movie. It's so creepy and scary, it always gets me." And her weirdest favorite quote is "I'll get you, my pretty, and your little dog, too!" She enjoys spending her days telling horror stories and frightening people. It's great fun for her, and she loves it. Spooky, isn't it? Enjoy the horror stories about simple things you find at home.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
